${ModID}:TheRod.NAME: The Rod
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, shuffle #b2 #yFish into your draw pile.

${ModID}:RainbowRod.NAME: Rainbow Rod
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL At the end of each turn, shuffle #b2 #yFish into your draw pile.

${ModID}:BrokenOar.NAME: Broken Oar
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL Draw 1 fewer card each turn.

${ModID}:DNAVial.NAME: DNA Vial
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #b2 times you play a #yFish each combat, shuffle an #yUpgraded copy into your draw pile.

${ModID}:SpareBait.NAME: Spare Bait
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if your hand is empty, gain #b1 #yStrength.

${ModID}:UnageeSkull.NAME: Unagee Skull
${ModID}:UnageeSkull.FLAVOR: guarded a treasure ship a long time ago
DESCRIPTIONS: #yGuppies grant #b2 more Block. #yPiranhas deal #b2 more damage.

${ModID}:Signpost.NAME: Signpost
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a #yMessage into your hand.

${ModID}:Starshield.NAME: Starshield
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card with a star in its art, gain #b1 #yBlock.

${ModID}:MaelstromAnkh.NAME: Maelstrom Ankh
DESCRIPTIONS: #yFish are now strange and powerful. At times, they may not cost #b0 or draw cards.
